description.japanese: すべての実績を取得した
description.french: Vous avez obtenu tous les succès.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto tutti gli obiettivi.
description.spanish: Has conseguido todos los logros.

description.japanese: エンディングを見た
description.french: Vous avez terminé le jeu.
description.italian: Hai completato il gioco.
description.spanish: Has completado el juego.

description.english: Filled all entries in Persona Compendium.
description.japanese: ペルソナ全書の登録率を１００％にした
description.french: Vous avez complété le Compendium.
description.italian: Hai compilato tutte le voci del Grimorio delle Personae.
description.spanish: Has completado todas las entradas del Compendio de Personas.
description.schinese: 人格面具全书的登录率达到１００％。
description.tchinese: 人格面具全書的登錄率達到１００％
description.polish: Uzupełniono wszystkie wpisy w kompendium Person.
description.brazilian: Preencheu todas as entradas do Compêndio de Personas.

description.japanese: アワードをすべて取得した
description.french: Vous avez obtenu toutes les primes.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto tutte le lodi.
description.spanish: Has conseguido todas las recompensas.

displayName.spanish: Un buen rato en el Leblanc

description.japanese: アジトの会話をすべて見た
description.french: Vous avez regardé toutes les conversations de la planque.
description.italian: Hai assistito a tutte le conversazioni del ritrovo.
description.spanish: Has reproducido todas las conversaciones del escondite.
description.schinese: 观看所有秘密基地的对话。
description.tchinese: 觀看了祕密基地的所有對話
description.brazilian: Assistiu a todas as conversas no esconderijo.

description.japanese: レベルをMAXにした
description.french: Vous avez atteint le niveau maximum.
description.italian: Hai raggiunto il livello massimo.
description.spanish: Has subido al nivel máximo.

description.japanese: ６６６６６６円を集めた
description.french: Vous avez accumulé 666 666 yens.
description.italian: Hai accumulato 666.666 yen.
description.spanish: Has acumulado 666 666 yenes.

description.japanese: サタナエルを作成した
description.french: Vous avez obtenu Satanaël via la fusion.
description.italian: Hai fuso Satanael.
description.spanish: Has fusionado a Satanael.

description.japanese: クエストをすべて達成した
description.french: Vous avez terminé toutes les quêtes.
description.italian: Hai completato tutte le missioni.
description.spanish: Has completado las misiones.

description.japanese: 武器を５０種購入した
description.french: Vous avez acheté 50 armes uniques.
description.italian: Hai acquistato 50 armi uniche.
description.spanish: Has comprado 50 armas únicas.

description.japanese: １００００マスを歩いた
description.french: Vous avez traversé 10 000 carrés.
description.italian: Hai attraversato 10.000 caselle.
description.spanish: Has atravesado 10 000 casillas.

description.japanese: 怪盗団全員集結
description.french: Vous avez réuni les Voleurs fantômes.
description.italian: Hai riunito i Ladri Fantasma.
description.spanish: Has reunido a los Ladrones Fantasma.
description.turkish: Hayalet Hırsızları yeniden bir araya getirdin.

description.english: Dealt 2,000 damage in a single attack.
description.japanese: 一度の攻撃で合計２０００のダメージを出した
description.french: Vous avez infligé 2 000 points de dégâts en une seule attaque.
description.italian: Hai inflitto 2.000 danni con un attacco.
description.koreana: 한 번의 공격으로 합계 2000 대미지를 입혔다
description.spanish: Has infligido 2000 de daño con un ataque.
description.schinese: 在一次攻击中造成共计２０００的伤害。
description.tchinese: 在單次攻擊中打出了合計２０００的傷害
description.russian: Нанести 2000 ед. урона за одну атаку.
description.polish: Zadano ponad 2000 obrażeń podczas jednego ataku.
description.brazilian: Causou 2.000 de dano em um único ataque.

description.french: Vous avez joué 500 tours.
description.italian: Hai giocato 500 turni.
description.spanish: Has jugado 500 turnos.
description.japanese: ５００ターンを経験した
１MOREを２００回取った
description.french: Vous avez déclenché 1 More 200 fois.
description.italian: Hai attivato Ancora 1 200 volte.
description.spanish: Has activado 1 MÁS 200 veces.

displayName.spanish: Donde pongo el ojo, pongo la bala

description.japanese: 射撃を１００回決めた
description.french: Vous avez effectué 100 tirs.
description.italian: Hai eseguito 100 attacchi a distanza.
description.spanish: Has realizado 100 disparos.

description.japanese: 近接攻撃を１００回決めた
description.french: Vous avez effectué 100 attaques de mêlée.
description.italian: Hai eseguito 100 attacchi in mischia.
description.spanish: Has realizado 100 ataques cuerpo a cuerpo.

description.japanese: ペルソナスキルを１００回決めた
description.french: Vous avez utilisé des compétences de Persona 100 fois.
description.italian: Hai usato abilità delle Personae 100 volte.
description.spanish: Has usado habilidades de Persona 100 veces.
description.tchinese: 發動人格面具技能達１００次

description.japanese: ユニークスキルを５０回決めた
description.french: Vous avez utilisé des compétences uniques 50 fois.
description.italian: Hai usato abilità uniche 50 volte.
description.spanish: Has usado habilidades únicas 50 veces.

description.japanese: 総攻撃を５０回決めた
description.french: Vous avez effectué 50 Assauts généraux.
description.italian: Hai eseguito Assalto 50 volte.
description.spanish: Has realizado 50 ataques combinados.
description.polish: Wykonano atak z całą mocą 50 razy.

description.japanese: バトンタッチを１０回行った
description.french: Vous avez effectué 10 Transferts.
description.italian: Hai eseguito Staffetta 10 volte.
description.spanish: Has realizado un Relevo 10 veces.

description.english: Learned the final skill in a skill tree.
description.japanese: 最強スキルを習得した
description.german: Den letzten Skill eines Skillbaums erlernt.
description.french: Vous avez appris la dernière compétence d'un arbre de compétences.
description.italian: Hai imparato l'abilità finale di un albero delle abilità.
description.spanish: Has aprendido la última habilidad de un árbol de habilidades.
description.russian: Освоить последний навык на древе навыков.
description.polish: Poznano ostatnią umiejętność z drzewka umiejętności.
description.turkish: Bir yetenek ağacında nihai yeteneği öğrendin.
description.brazilian: Aprendeu a habilidade final de uma árvore de habilidades.

description.japanese: 合体事故が起きた
description.french: Vous avez été témoin d'un accident de fusion.
description.italian: Hai assistito a un incidente di fusione.
description.spanish: Has sido testigo de un accidente de fusión.

description.japanese: 武器を１０種購入した
description.french: Vous avez acheté 10 armes.
description.italian: Hai acquistato 10 armi.
description.spanish: Has comprado 10 armas.

description.english: Gained the ability to fuse Personas.
description.japanese: ペルソナ合体を行えるようになった
description.german: Die Fähigkeit erlangt, Personas zu fusionieren.
description.french: Vous avez obtenu la capacité de fusionner des Personae.
description.italian: Hai ottenuto l'abilità di fondere le Personae.
description.spanish: Has aprendido a fusionar Personas.
description.schinese: 可以进行人格面具合体了。
description.tchinese: 可以開始進行人格面具合體
description.brazilian: Ganhou a habilidade de fundir Personas.

description.japanese: 武器の分解を１０回行った
description.french: Vous avez démonté des armes 10 fois.
description.italian: Hai smontato armi 10 volte.
description.spanish: Has desmontado armas 10 veces.

description.japanese: 武器の合成を１０回行った
description.french: Vous avez fusionné des armes 10 fois.
description.italian: Hai fuso armi 10 volte.
description.spanish: Has fusionado armas 10 veces.

description.german: Den Boss des ersten Königreichs besiegt.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le boss du premier royaume.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il boss del primo Regno.
description.spanish: Has derrotado al jefe del primer Reino.
description.schinese: 打倒第一个王国的首领。
description.japanese: １つ目のキングダムのボスを撃破した

description.german: Den Boss des zweiten Königreichs besiegt.

description.italian: Hai sconfitto il boss del secondo Regno.

description.japanese: ２つ目のキングダムのボスを撃破した
description.brazilian: Derrotou o chefe do segundo Reino.

displayName.polish: Ci, którzy mierzą się z własną przeszłością

description.german: Den Boss des dritten Königreichs besiegt.
description.french: Vous avez vaincu le boss du troisième royaume.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il boss del terzo Regno.
description.spanish: Has derrotado al jefe del tercer Reino.

description.french: Vous avez vaincu le boss du quatrième royaume.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il boss del quarto Regno.
description.spanish: Has derrotado al jefe del cuarto Reino.

description.japanese: ４つ目のキングダムのボスを撃破した
description.brazilian: Derrotou o chefe do quarto Reino.

description.english: Inflicted Sleep using fusion weapons 20 times.
description.japanese: 合成武器で敵に２０回睡眠を付与した
description.french: Vous avez endormi des ennemis à l'aide d'armes de fusion 20 fois.
description.italian: Hai inflitto Sonno 20 volte usando armi fuse.
description.spanish: Has infligido Sueño con armas de fusión 20 veces.
description.schinese: 使用合成武器给敌人附加２０次睡眠。
description.tchinese: 用合成武器對敵人附加睡眠狀態達２０次
description.russian: Погрузить врага в сон 20 раз, используя созданное оружие.
description.polish: Wywołano uśpienie przy pomocy broni z fuzji 20 razy.
description.turkish: Düşmanlara birleştirme silahlarını kullanarak 20 defa Uyku uyguladın.
description.brazilian: Infligiu Sono 20 vezes usando fusões de arma.

description.english: Inflicted Despair on enemies with Joker 20 times.
description.japanese: 主人公が敵に２０回絶望を付与した
description.german: Mit Joker 20-mal Gegner mit Verzweiflung belegt.
description.french: Vous avez désespéré des ennemis avec Joker 20 fois.
description.italian: Hai inflitto Disperazione 20 volte con Joker.
description.spanish: Has infligido Desesperación a los enemigos con Joker 20 veces.
description.schinese: 主角给敌人附加２０次绝望。
description.tchinese: 主人公對敵人附加絕望狀態達２０次
description.russian: Джокер: вызвать у врага отчаяние 20 раз.
description.polish: Joker wywołał u wrogów rozpacz 20 razy.
description.turkish: Düşmanlara Şakacı ile 20 defa Çaresizlik uyguladın.
description.brazilian: Infligiu Desespero a inimigos 20 vezes com Curinga.

description.english: Inflicted Shock on enemies with Ryuji 20 times.
description.japanese: 竜司が敵に２０回感電を付与した
description.german: Mit Ryuji 20-mal Gegner mit Schock belegt.
description.french: Vous avez électrocuté des ennemis avec Ryuji 20 fois.
description.italian: Hai inflitto Folgorazione 20 volte con Ryuji.
description.spanish: Has infligido Electrificación a los enemigos con Ryuji 20 veces.
description.schinese: 龙司给敌人附加２０次触电。
description.tchinese: 龍司對敵人附加觸電狀態達２０次
description.turkish: Düşmanlara Ryuji ile 20 defa Şok uyguladın.
description.brazilian: Infligiu Choque a inimigos 20 vezes com Ryuji.

description.english: Swept away enemies with Morgana 20 times.
description.japanese: モルガナが敵を２０回吹き飛ばした
description.french: Vous avez balayé des ennemis avec Morgana 20 fois.
description.italian: Hai inflitto Spazzata 20 volte con Morgana.
description.spanish: Has barrido a los enemigos con Morgana 20 veces.
description.tchinese: 摩爾加納把敵人打飛達２０次
description.turkish: Düşmanları Morgana ile 20 defa silip süpürdün.

description.english: Inflicted Burn on enemies with Ann 20 times.
description.japanese: 杏が敵に２０回炎上を付与した
description.german: Mit Ann 20-mal Gegner mit Brennen belegt.
description.french: Vous avez brûlé des ennemis avec Ann 20 fois.
description.italian: Hai inflitto In fiamme 20 volte con Ann.
description.spanish: Has infligido Quemadura a los enemigos con Ann 20 veces.
description.tchinese: 杏對敵人附加燃燒狀態達２０次
description.turkish: Düşmanlara Ann ile 20 defa Yanma uyguladın.
description.brazilian: Infligiu Queimadura a inimigos 20 vezes com Ann.

description.english: Inflicted Freeze on enemies with Yusuke 20 times.
description.japanese: 祐介が敵に２０回凍結を付与した
description.german: Mit Yusuke 20-mal Gegner mit Starre belegt.
description.french: Vous avez gelé des ennemis avec Yusuke 20 fois.
description.italian: Hai inflitto Congelamento 20 volte con Yusuke.
description.spanish: Has infligido Congelación a los enemigos con Yusuke 20 veces.
description.schinese: 佑介给敌人附加２０次冻结。
description.tchinese: 祐介對敵人附加凍結狀態達２０次
description.turkish: Düşmanlara Yusuke ile 20 defa Donma uyguladın.
description.brazilian: Infligiu Congelamento a inimigos 20 vezes com Yusuke.

description.english: Pulled enemies into Vortex with Makoto 20 times.
description.japanese: 真が敵を２０回引っ張った
description.german: Mit Makoto 20-mal Gegner in einen Vortex gezogen.
description.french: Vous avez attiré des ennemis dans un Vortex avec Makoto 20 fois.
description.italian: Hai inflitto Vortice 20 volte con Makoto.
description.spanish: Has atraído a los enemigos al Vórtice con Makoto 20 veces.
description.tchinese: 真將敵人拉進我方範圍達２０次
description.russian: Макото: затянуть в воронку врага 20 раз.
description.polish: Makoto wciągnęła wrogów w wir 20 razy.
description.turkish: Düşmanları Makoto ile 20 defa Girdaba çektin.
description.brazilian: Puxou inimigos no Vórtice 20 vezes com Makoto.

description.japanese: 春が敵を２０回引き寄せた
description.french: Vous avez hypnotisé des ennemis avec Haru 20 fois.
description.italian: Hai inflitto Ipnosi 20 volte con Haru.
description.spanish: Has hipnotizado enemigos con Haru 20 veces.
description.tchinese: 春吸引敵人的注意達２０次
description.turkish: Düşmanları Haru ile 20 defa hipnotize ettin.

description.japanese: エルが敵に２０回忘却を付与した
description.german: Mit Erina 20-mal Gegner mit Vergessen belegt.
description.french: Vous avez infligé Amnésie avec Erina 20 fois.
description.italian: Hai inflitto Amnesia 20 volte con Erina.
description.spanish: Has infligido Amnesia con Erina 20 veces.
description.schinese: 埃尔给敌人附加２０次遗忘。
